vista.time
Class TimeFormat

java.lang.Object
  java.text.Format
      java.text.DateFormat
          vista.time.TimeFormat
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefaultTimeFormat, SubTimeFormat
public abstract class TimeFormat
extends java.text.DateFormat

Formats date according to HEC DSS criteria. namely midnight is interpreted as 2400 of the previous day.

Version:
$Id: TimeFormat.java,v 1.1 2003/10/02 20:49:36 redwood Exp $
Author:
Nicky Sandhu
